group_1.narration: "I am sorry, ma'am."
"I have a habit of becoming a parasite @upon finding any accommodation, @so the nomadic lifestyle @is actually what I most enjoy."

group_1.textRight: Be sure to study once you're done watching your @show, okay―?

group_1.textLeft: Just a minuuute! It's almost over!

group_1.narration: "I suggest you keep your eyes peeled from now on as well, @Ma'am..."
"Because that little thing called 'truth' @may be lying somewhere much closer than you expect."
Parapapa―pa―papa―papapa―♪
CAST@Wandering Detective Kouichi Todoroki@Takehiko Sakaki

group_1.textCenter: Mr. Todoroki was as cool as ever today~!
I want to be like that too!
I want to become a hero!
Maybe I oughta do a little exercise to build up my @strength!

group_1.textRight: If you want to be like Mr. Todoroki, @you'll need brains as well.
So you'd better study up on your classic literature, @like you promised!

group_1.textLeft: Errgh. @Why's it have to be classics, of all things?

group_1.textRight: You have to! It's the Hiroe family tradition.

group_1.textLeft: A tradition that'll end with my generation, @if I have anything to say about it...

group_1.textRight: Oh, a phone call... @Wait just a minute.

group_1.narration: "Today's Parliament is focusing on the case of crimes @committed by Ministry of Defense officials which @were concealed by the Metropolitan Police Department.@Angry rebukes from both sides continue to @escalate in the Houses of Parliament."

group_1.textCenter: How can there be bad guys in the police? @They're supposed to be heroes...

group_1.narration: One call...
It was really just one phone call @that changed my life.
It all started with my mother's voice, @which gradually became heavier @as she answered the call behind the door.
As she replied "yes", @I could hear her voice trembling slightly.
Then...

group_1.textRight: It's real... @The Tokime Clan's village is real.
Yes. We'll be leaving tomorrow, so you need to go @and pack.

group_1.narration: I left the house with my mother, @just as she told me to.
Driving along the expressways...
Trundling over a mountain road...
Getting out of the car...
And walking down a path that @stretched deep into the forest...
To a place deep inside, somewhere that I @"couldn't even find on satellite images" @when I looked it up on my phone.
The Tokime Clan's village...

group_1.textRight: Did you hear from Lady Mikoshiba?

group_1.textLeft: Not about anything in particular, no?

group_1.textRight: She said you'll soon be attending your @coming-of-age ceremony as a Diviner.

group_1.textLeft: ...Even I have to grow up, I suppose.

group_1.textRight: Yes... Actually, I have something @to tell you before that.

group_1.textLeft: Have you gotten used to staying at @Lady Mikoshiba's home?

group_1.textRight: Yes, though I'm still learning about all the @household items and rules.
More importantly, there's a Devil nearby.

group_1.textLeft: Right. It's been a while, so we've got to be careful.

group_1.textRight: Quite right. We Diviners are the only ones who can @rid the world of Devils, after all.
